page.title: 02A bypass for Glastonbury
page.content: As far as most people are concerned the town desperately needs a{bypass. At present it is very dangerous for children and older people to cross the High Street. Sometimes the cars do not even stop at the Zebra crossing. There are often cars parked on the side of the main road and with heavy goods lorries and other large vehicles rumbling through the main thoroughfare there is the added aggravation of {noise and pollution as well as danger to pedestrians. Many people feel that if the High Street was turned into a {pedestrian precinct}with flower beds,trees and benches like Bath, the place would become much more attractive to both residents and tourists. People are worried that the council is not taking enough action to get the scheme under way.
